title: Shopify - jquery+ UI front-end developer
snippet:
I need a feature in Shopify:

1. Creating a special collection that user can drag and drop products on the screen.
2. Each product in this collection has several predefined number of layers. 
The user can change the colour of each layer in each product. 
3. When the user submit his selections of products and layer colors an order is created in shopify. 

an example:  https://8bar-bikes.com/design-your-ride/
